name: Aries
shortDescription: Bold, ambitious, and fearless. Aries dives headfirst into the most challenging situations.
longDescription: Aries is the first sign of the zodiac, and that's exactly how those born under this sign like it: first. Aries are the leaders of the pack, blazing trails and setting the pace. They're competitive, bold, and unafraid of conflict. With Mars as their ruling planet, Aries possess a warrior-like energy that drives them to conquer every challenge that comes their way.
loveStyle: In love, Aries is passionate and direct. They don't play games and prefer partners who match their energy. When an Aries falls in love, they fall hard and fast. They need excitement and spontaneity in relationships to stay engaged.
careerStyle: Aries thrives in leadership positions and competitive environments. They excel as entrepreneurs, athletes, military leaders, and emergency responders. They need autonomy and the freedom to make quick decisions.
friendshipStyle: As friends, Aries are fiercely loyal and always ready for adventure. They're the ones who will defend you without hesitation and push you to be your best self.

name: Taurus
shortDescription: Grounded, loyal, and sensual. Taurus savors life's pleasures and builds lasting foundations.
longDescription: Taurus is the anchor of the zodiac. Represented by the bull, this earth sign is known for its steadfast nature and appreciation for the finer things in life. Ruled by Venus, Taurus has a deep connection to beauty, art, and comfort. They work hard to create a stable, luxurious life and are incredibly loyal to those they love.
loveStyle: Taurus is a deeply romantic and sensual partner. They express love through physical touch, thoughtful gifts, and quality time. They seek stability and commitment, and once they're in, they're in for the long haul.
careerStyle: Taurus excels in careers that offer stability and tangible results. They make excellent bankers, chefs, artists, architects, and agricultural professionals. They value financial security above all.
friendshipStyle: As friends, Taurus is the rock everyone leans on. They're the ones who remember your birthday, cook you dinner when you're sad, and offer unwavering support through thick and thin.

name: Gemini
shortDescription: Curious, social, and versatile. Gemini thrives on communication and intellectual stimulation.
longDescription: Gemini is the social butterfly of the zodiac. Represented by the twins, this air sign is all about duality ‚Äî they can see both sides of any situation. Ruled by Mercury, the planet of communication, Geminis are natural conversationalists who can talk to anyone about anything. Their quick minds and restless curiosity make them endlessly fascinating.
loveStyle: In love, Gemini needs intellectual stimulation above all else. They want a partner who can keep up with their rapid-fire conversation, share new experiences, and give them enough space to breathe. Variety and spontaneity are key.
careerStyle: Gemini excels in communication-driven careers: journalism, marketing, teaching, writing, and public relations. They need mental stimulation and variety ‚Äî a monotonous desk job would drive them crazy.
friendshipStyle: Gemini friends are endlessly entertaining. They always know the latest news, have the best stories, and can make anyone laugh. They have wide social circles and bring diverse groups together.

name: Cancer
shortDescription: Nurturing, intuitive, and deeply emotional. Cancer creates a safe haven for everyone they love.
longDescription: Cancer is the nurturer of the zodiac. Ruled by the Moon, this water sign is deeply connected to emotions, intuition, and the concept of home. Cancers are fiercely protective of their loved ones and will go to great lengths to create a safe, comfortable environment. Their emotional depth is both their greatest strength and their most significant vulnerability.
loveStyle: Cancer loves deeply and completely. They seek emotional security and a partner who understands their need for closeness. They express love through nurturing ‚Äî cooking, caring, and creating a beautiful home together.
careerStyle: Cancer thrives in caregiving and creative roles: nursing, teaching, social work, interior design, and the culinary arts. They bring emotional intelligence to any workplace.
friendshipStyle: Cancer friends are the ones who remember every detail about you, check in when you're going through a tough time, and always have a warm meal waiting.

name: Leo
shortDescription: Dramatic, charismatic, and fiery. Leo rules the spotlight with natural confidence and warmth.
longDescription: Leo is the king of the zodiac jungle. Ruled by the Sun, this fire sign radiates warmth, creativity, and magnetic charisma. Leos are natural-born leaders who love to be in the spotlight. They're generous, loyal, and fiercely protective of their pride. Their dramatic flair and infectious enthusiasm make them impossible to ignore.
loveStyle: Leo loves grand romantic gestures and being adored. They're generous and devoted partners who shower their loved ones with attention and gifts. They need a partner who appreciates their brightness without trying to dim it.
careerStyle: Leo shines in performance, leadership, and creative fields: acting, directing, politics, management, and entertainment. They need a stage ‚Äî whether literal or figurative.
friendshipStyle: Leo friends are the life of every party. They're generous, fun, and fiercely loyal. They'll hype you up, celebrate your wins, and make sure everyone knows how amazing you are.

name: Virgo
shortDescription: Analytical, practical, and perfectionist. Virgo notices every detail others miss.
longDescription: Virgo is the perfectionist of the zodiac. Ruled by Mercury, this earth sign is characterized by an incredible attention to detail, a deep sense of humanity, and a methodical approach to life. Virgos are often misunderstood as cold or overly critical, but beneath their analytical exterior lies a deeply caring soul who just wants everything to be the best it can be.
loveStyle: Virgo shows love through acts of service. They'll organize your life, remember your medication schedule, and notice when something's off before you even realize it yourself. They seek partners who appreciate their dedication.
careerStyle: Virgo excels in detail-oriented careers: medicine, research, editing, accounting, and quality assurance. They're the ones who catch the mistake everyone else missed.
friendshipStyle: Virgo friends are the most reliable people you'll ever meet. They show up when they say they will, give the most thoughtful advice, and always have a practical solution to your problems.

name: Libra
shortDescription: Harmonious, elegant, and fair. Libra seeks balance and beauty in everything.
longDescription: Libra is the harmonizer of the zodiac. Ruled by Venus, this air sign is obsessed with symmetry, beauty, and fairness. Libras are natural diplomats who can see every side of an argument and find common ground. They're charming, social creatures who create beauty wherever they go ‚Äî in their homes, relationships, and the world at large.
loveStyle: Libra is in love with love itself. They're romantic, attentive partners who go above and beyond to create harmony in their relationships. They need a partner who values communication and isn't afraid to work through conflicts together.
careerStyle: Libra thrives in fields that require diplomacy and aesthetics: law, design, counseling, human resources, and the arts. They're natural mediators and peacemakers.
friendshipStyle: Libra friends are the peacemakers of the group. They plan the perfect gatherings, mediate conflicts, and make sure everyone feels included and valued.

name: Scorpio
shortDescription: Intense, mysterious, and powerful. Scorpio feels everything deeply and never forgets.
longDescription: Scorpio is the most intense sign of the zodiac. Ruled by Pluto, the planet of transformation, and Mars, the planet of war, Scorpios are passionate, powerful, and deeply emotional beings. They see through facades with laser precision and are drawn to life's deepest mysteries. Cross a Scorpio and they'll never forget it; earn their trust and they'll be loyal for life.
loveStyle: Scorpio loves with an all-consuming intensity. They seek deep, transformative connections and have zero tolerance for superficiality. When they commit, they give everything ‚Äî and expect the same in return.
careerStyle: Scorpio excels in roles that require investigation and depth: psychology, detective work, surgery, research, and crisis management. They're drawn to uncovering hidden truths.
friendshipStyle: Scorpio keeps a small, tight circle. They're the friend who will take your secrets to the grave, defend you fiercely, and help you through your darkest moments with unwavering loyalty.

name: Sagittarius
shortDescription: Adventurous, optimistic, and philosophical. Sagittarius chases horizons and speaks truth.
longDescription: Sagittarius is the explorer of the zodiac. Ruled by Jupiter, the planet of expansion and good fortune, Sagittarians are eternal optimists with an insatiable appetite for adventure, knowledge, and freedom. They're the philosophers and wanderers, always searching for the meaning of life through travel, culture, and deep conversation.
loveStyle: Sagittarius needs a partner who understands their need for freedom and adventure. They're passionate but need space. The quickest way to lose a Sagittarius is to try to cage them. Win their heart by being their adventure companion.
careerStyle: Sagittarius thrives in careers that offer freedom and exploration: travel industry, education, publishing, sports, and international business. They need a job that feels like an adventure.
friendshipStyle: Sagittarius friends are the ones who will drag you on spontaneous road trips, introduce you to people from different cultures, and make you laugh until your stomach hurts.

name: Capricorn
shortDescription: Ambitious, disciplined, and patient. Capricorn climbs the mountain one steady step at a time.
longDescription: Capricorn is the CEO of the zodiac. Ruled by Saturn, the planet of discipline and structure, Capricorns are the most ambitious and hardworking signs. They set long-term goals and achieve them through sheer determination and patience. They may seem serious on the outside, but they have a wicked sense of humor and a surprisingly tender heart.
loveStyle: Capricorn takes love seriously. They're not interested in flings ‚Äî they want a partnership that's built to last. They show love through stability, loyalty, and building a secure future together.
careerStyle: Capricorn excels in leadership and structured environments: CEO, finance, law, politics, engineering, and management. They're the ones who work their way to the top ‚Äî and stay there.
friendshipStyle: Capricorn friends are loyal, dependable, and full of surprisingly dry humor. They'll give you tough love when you need it and celebrate your successes as if they were their own.

name: Aquarius
shortDescription: Innovative, humanitarian, and independent. Aquarius marches to the beat of their own drum.
longDescription: Aquarius is the rebel and visionary of the zodiac. Ruled by Uranus, the planet of innovation and revolution, Aquarians are forward-thinking humanitarians who dream of making the world a better place. They're fiercely independent, intellectually curious, and unapologetically unique. They'd rather be weird and authentic than normal and boring.
loveStyle: Aquarius needs intellectual connection first, emotional connection second. They want a partner who respects their independence and shares their vision for a better world. Love with an Aquarius is unconventional but deeply meaningful.
careerStyle: Aquarius excels in innovation and humanitarian work: technology, science, nonprofit, activism, and creative arts. They need a career that aligns with their values and allows them to think differently.
friendshipStyle: Aquarius friends are the most interesting people you'll ever meet. They introduce you to new ideas, challenge your thinking, and are always fighting for some cause that makes the world better.

name: Pisces
weaknesses: Can be a victim or martyr
shortDescription: Dreamy, empathetic, and artistic. Pisces swims between fantasy and reality with effortless grace.
longDescription: Pisces is the mystic dreamer of the zodiac. Ruled by Neptune, the planet of dreams and spirituality, Pisceans are the most intuitive and emotionally deep sign. They absorb the emotions of everyone around them like a psychic sponge. They're natural artists, healers, and storytellers who see the world through a lens of compassion and imagination.
loveStyle: Pisces loves with their entire soul. They're the ultimate romantics who believe in soulmates and fairy-tale love. They need a partner who appreciates their sensitivity and doesn't take advantage of their giving nature.
careerStyle: Pisces excels in creative and healing careers: music, art, film, therapy, nursing, and spiritual counseling. They bring empathy and imagination to everything they do.
friendshipStyle: Pisces friends are the ones who feel your pain before you even say a word. They're compassionate listeners, creative inspirations, and the friends who always know exactly what you need to hear.
